ABOUT US

Here at Astrocruise, we are passionate about making the dream of space travel a reality for everyone. With years of experience in the industry, we have developed a reputation for delivering safe and unforgettable experiences that allow our guests to experience the wonders of space firsthand.
Our team of dedicated professionals is made up of former astronauts, aerospace engineers, and space enthusiasts who are committed to providing the best possible experience for our guests. From the moment you book your trip with us, you will be treated like a VIP, with personalized attention and top-notch customer service at every step of the way.
Our space tourism trips offer a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to witness the breathtaking beauty of our galaxy like you've never seen before, float weightlessly in zero gravity, and experience the thrill of rocket launch. We offer a variety of space tourism packages to suit different budgets and interests, and we are constantly developing new and exciting offerings to give our guests the best possible experience. So come join us on the adventure of a lifetime and make your dream of space travel a reality.
We can't wait to welcome you aboard!

-The Astrocruise Team
